Sanitize Row Data

Source: R/sanitizeRowData.R
sanitizeRowData.Rd

Coerce gene annotations to DataFrame, and keep only atomic columns. Complex columns (e.g. Entrez ID list) will fail to write to disk as CSVs.

sanitizeRowData(object)

Arguments

object

Object.

Value

DataFrame. Contains only character and factor columns.

Note

Supports GRanges and DataFrame class objects.

Examples

data(rse_small)
from <- SummarizedExperiment::rowRanges(rse_small)
colnames(S4Vectors::mcols(from))
#> [1] "geneID"      "geneName"    "geneBiotype"
#> [4] "broadClass"  "entrezID"   
to <- sanitizeRowData(from)
vapply(to, is.atomic, logical(1L))
#>    seqnames       start         end       width 
#>        TRUE        TRUE        TRUE        TRUE 
#>      strand      geneID    geneName geneBiotype 
#>        TRUE        TRUE        TRUE        TRUE 
#>  broadClass 
#>        TRUE 
print(to)
#> DataFrame with 50 rows and 9 columns
#>        seqnames     start       end     width
#>        <factor> <integer> <integer> <integer>
#> gene1         X 100627109 100639991     12883
#> gene2         X 100584802 100599885     15084
#> gene3        20  50934867  50958555     23689
#> gene4         1 169849631 169894267     44637
#> gene5         1 169662007 169854080    192074
#> ...         ...       ...       ...       ...
#> gene46        7 127588345 127591705      3361
#> gene47       17  28364356  28404049     39694
#> gene48       17  28347177  28357522     10346
#> gene49        3 129555175 129606818     51644
#> gene50        1  33007940  33080996     73057
#>          strand          geneID    geneName
#>        <factor>     <character> <character>
#> gene1         - ENSG00000000003      TSPAN6
#> gene2         + ENSG00000000005        TNMD
#> gene3         - ENSG00000000419        DPM1
#> gene4         - ENSG00000000457       SCYL3
#> gene5         + ENSG00000000460    C1orf112
#> ...         ...             ...         ...
#> gene46        + ENSG00000004059        ARF5
#> gene47        + ENSG00000004139       SARM1
#> gene48        - ENSG00000004142     POLDIP2
#> gene49        - ENSG00000004399      PLXND1
#> gene50        - ENSG00000004455         AK2
#>           geneBiotype  broadClass
#>           <character> <character>
#> gene1  protein_coding      coding
#> gene2  protein_coding      coding
#> gene3  protein_coding      coding
#> gene4  protein_coding      coding
#> gene5  protein_coding      coding
#> ...               ...         ...
#> gene46 protein_coding      coding
#> gene47 protein_coding      coding
#> gene48 protein_coding      coding
#> gene49 protein_coding      coding
#> gene50 protein_coding      coding
